SlepcVecPoolGetVecs

Get an array of Vec from the pool.

Synopsis

#include "slepcvec.h" 
PetscErrorCode SlepcVecPoolGetVecs(VecPool p,PetscInt n,Vec **vecs)
Collective on p

Input Parameters

p  - pool of Vec.
n  - number of vectors.

Output Parameter

vecs  - vectors

See Also

SlepcVecPoolRestoreVecs()

Level

developer

Location

src/sys/vec/pool.c
